title: frankmakrdiss
description: Supplemental R package for Frank Krumbholz's doctoral dissertation at the FernUniversität in Hagen.
references: Krumbholz, F. (2023). Psychological Sense of Community: Inhaltsvalidität von Testverfahren in Abhängigkeit von Bezugsgemeinschaften [Psychological sense of community: Content validity of tests in dependence of reference communities] [Unpublished doctoral dissertation]. FernUniversität in Hagen.
